gw.api.graph

Class Tree<T extends java.lang.Object>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.graph.Tree<T>

  • public class Tree<T extends java.lang.Object>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a tree as a specialized form of a graph.
